column4: i tried loading the fglrx drivers on another machine with ati hd 3300 and apparently they miss the id for this chipset, making the box slow and unusable
did you see if your card is already supported or not by ati or does ubuntu have native support?
ati has support for it on catalyst 9.4, i'm not too sure about ubuntu.
do you think i should try the ati binary with the "make distribution package" option?
no, i don't care for compiz right now. just wanted to put my resolution back to 1650x1200
and it doesn't detect the monitor anymore
thanks a lot for your help, if this doesn't fix it, i'll just install jaunty.
always better to try out the latest version
ok, i just wanted a quick dirty fix to get back to work
